title: 'New Yorker' writer traces the current U.S. boarder crisis back to the Cold War
description: Hundreds of thousands of people, mostly from Central America, arrive at the U.S.-Mexico border each year. In Everyone Who is Gone is Here, Jonathan Blitzer examines the historical roots of the crisis.

title: A luxury Dior handbag rattles South Korea's politics
description: A gift accepted by the country's first lady has set off very public debates about ethics and revealed ruling party divisions just weeks before legislative elections.
